entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as someone who has found out everything he needs and has gotten Dumbledore out of the way. He is also mentioned as sending a note to the Ministry of Magic.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as being out of the way by Snape.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as receiving a note from Snape.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor house is mentioned as being unable to afford losing more points.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as someone who has been warned by Snape.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as gasping in response to Snape's warning.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who has been warned by Snape along with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: staff room
entities.description: The staff room is mentioned as a location where Snape is heading.

relationships.description: Snape has gotten Dumbledore out of the way.
Snape sent a note to the Ministry of Magic.
Snape is concerned about Gryffindor losing points.
Snape is heading to the staff room.
